data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 75,600 people living in the state of Finnmark.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Finnmark, Norway
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Finnmark
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Finnmark, Norway to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Finnmark.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Somali people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Finnmark.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Finnmark, Norway.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Finnmark.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Finnmark
location.people_groups_list: Thai, Bosniak, Albanian, Moroccan, Arabic-speaking, Czech
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Thai (21,000), Bosniak (18,000), Albanian (10,000), Moroccan, Arabic-speaking (8,000), Czech (2,200)
